parse.title: List of schools for the deaf

text.*:
This is a list of schools for the deaf, organized by country.

Contents

  • 1 United States
    • 1.1 Deaf residential schools
    • 1.2 Deaf day schools
    • 1.3 Defunct deaf schools
  • 2 United States territories
  • 3 Canada
  • 4 Oceania

    • 4.2 New Zealand

School Established Closed City State Grades

Wyoming School for the Deaf 1961 2000 Casper Wyoming PreK-12

Asia[edit]

India[edit]

  • Agostino Vicini's Special School

  • Gwangju Inhwa School
